name: boba (Nasty Old Wizard)
description:
BOBA

A game about bubbles and stopping time

Controls:

Arrow Keys / D-Pad(Gamepad) -> walk

Z / A(Gamepad) -> jump

Maker Controls:

Left Click -> place object

Right Click -> delete object

Shift + Hold Left Click -> place moving saw / bubble

Credits: Programming & Design

Casey MacNeil

Art & Design

Dalton Leavey

Music & Sound

Connor Grail

Cover Art

Sony-Shock

Support Us!! <3

Please consider donating, we would love to continue to work on BOBA and turn it into a full game!
